info.name: StartGoals API Collection - Complete
info.description: Complete API documentation for StartGoals Learning Management System with all available endpoints.

item.description:
Comprehensive API collection for admin user management, role-based access control, activity tracking, and permissions management in the StartGoals platform.

**Features:**
- Admin user CRUD operations
- Role-based permissions (Super Admin, Course Manager, Project Manager, Payment Manager, Certificate Manager)
- Activity logging and monitoring
- Password management
- Data export capabilities
- Security features with audit trails

**Base URL:** `/api/admin/roles`

**Authentication:** Bearer Token required for all endpoints
item.name: Admin Role Management API
Admin User Management

query.description: Filter by admin role (super_admin, course_manager, project_manager, payment_manager, certificate_manager)

request.description: Retrieve all admin users with role filtering and analytics. Includes pagination, sorting, and comprehensive user data with activity scores.
Get specific admin user details with permissions and activity data. Supports self-access for limited profile viewing.
Create a new admin user with specified role and permissions. Only Super Admin can create new admin accounts.
Update admin user details including role, permissions, and profile information. Self-access allowed for limited fields.
Change admin user password with current password verification. Supports self-password change and Super Admin override.
Delete admin user with safety checks. Prevents self-deletion and Super Admin deletion. Only accessible by Super Admin.

item.description: Admin user management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting admin accounts with role-based permissions.

item.name: Activity Tracking

query.description: Filter by specific admin user ID
Filter by action type (login, course, user, project, payment, settings)

request.description: Get admin activity logs with advanced filtering options. Includes detailed tracking of admin actions, IP addresses, and timestamps for security monitoring.

item.description: Activity logging and tracking endpoints for monitoring admin user behavior and system security.

item.name: Permissions & Roles

request.description: Get role permissions and hierarchy information. Returns available roles, their permission levels, and access rights within the system.

item.description: Role and permission management endpoints for understanding the administrative hierarchy and access controls.

item.name: Data Export

request.description: Export admin users and activity data in various formats (CSV, Excel, JSON). Only accessible by Super Admin for compliance and reporting purposes.

item.description: Data export capabilities for admin user information and activity logs for compliance and reporting.

item.description:
**CORRECTED VERSION** - Comprehensive API collection for managing student enrollments in batches with proper parameter handling and complete field coverage.

**Key Features:**
- Add/remove individual students from batches
- Bulk student enrollment operations
- Student status management (active, inactive, dropped, completed)
- Batch statistics and analytics
- Student batch history viewing
- Proper UUID validation and error handling

**Base URL:** `/api/batch-students`

**Authentication:** Teacher role required for management operations, Student role for viewing own batches

**Important:** This collection uses proper parameter formats matching the actual controller implementation.
item.name: Batch Students Management API
Student Enrollment Management

request.description: Add a student to a specific batch. Creates enrollment record with active status. Validates UUID format and checks for existing enrollments.

variable.description: UUID of the user to remove

request.description: Remove a student from a specific batch. Permanently deletes the enrollment record.
Update student status within a batch. Valid statuses: active, inactive, dropped, completed.
Add multiple students to a batch in a single operation. Skips students already enrolled and returns detailed results.

item.description: Endpoints for managing student enrollments in batches

item.name: Data Retrieval

query.description: Filter by student status (active, inactive, dropped, completed)

request.description: Get all students enrolled in a specific batch with pagination and status filtering.
Get all batches a specific student is enrolled in with course information.

item.description: Endpoints for retrieving batch enrollment data

item.name: Analytics & Statistics

request.description: Get comprehensive statistics for a batch including enrollment counts by status (active, inactive, dropped, completed).

item.description: Analytics and reporting endpoints for batch enrollment statistics

Comprehensive API collection for managing course and project categories with advanced features including hierarchical categories, bulk operations, analytics, and category performance tracking.

**Enhanced Features:**
- Hierarchical category management (parent-child relationships)
- Category analytics and performance metrics
- Bulk category operations
- Category content statistics
- SEO optimization for categories
- Category recommendation engine
- Multi-language category support

**Base URL:** `/api/categories`

**Authentication:** Admin access required for management operations, public access for browsing
item.name: Category Management API

request.description: Create a new category with hierarchical structure, metadata, SEO optimization, and localization support.

variable.description: Category ID or 'root' for full tree

request.description: Get category hierarchy tree with comprehensive statistics including course counts, enrollment numbers, and performance metrics.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Advanced Web Development",
  "description": "Advanced web development courses for experienced developers looking to master cutting-edge technologies and best practices.",
  "isActive": true,
  "displayOrder": 1,
  "metadata": {
    "icon": "fas fa-laptop-code",
    "color": "#0056b3",
    "bannerImage": "https://example.com/images/advanced-web-dev-banner.jpg",
    "difficulty": "intermediate-to-advanced",
    "estimatedLearningTime": "6-12 months",

      "Basic HTML, CSS, JavaScript knowledge",
      "Understanding of programming fundamentals",
      "Familiarity with web development concepts"
    ],
    "careerPaths": [

      "Full Stack Architect",
      "Technical Lead",
      "DevOps Engineer"
    ],

      "React", "Node.js", "TypeScript", "GraphQL", "Docker", "AWS"

      "typescript",

      "microservices",

      "type": "website"

  "targeting": {

    "jobRoles": ["developer", "architect", "tech-lead", "cto"],
    "industries": ["tech", "fintech", "healthcare", "e-commerce"],

      "career advancement",
      "skill specialization",
      "technology mastery",
      "leadership preparation"
    ]
  }
}

item.description:
API collection for managing course levels including bulk upload operations, level retrieval, and level-specific data management.

**Features:**
- Bulk upload course levels
- Retrieve all course levels
- Get specific course level details
- Level-based course organization

**Base URL:** `/api/course-levels`

**Authentication:** Teacher role required for management operations, public access for viewing individual levels
item.name: Course Level Management API
Course Level Management

item.description:
API collection for handling file uploads with support for multiple file types, secure storage, and authenticated access.

**Features:**
- Multi-file upload support
- Authenticated file uploads
- Dynamic file handling
- Secure file storage
- File type validation

**Base URL:** `/api/file-upload`

**Authentication:** Bearer token required for all file upload operations
item.name: File Upload API
File Upload Operations

formdata.description: Type of upload (course_material, project_file, profile_image, document)
Whether files should be publicly accessible
Comma-separated list of roles that can access these files
Maximum file size in bytes (10MB default)

request.description:
Upload multiple files with metadata and access control options. Supports various file types including documents, images, videos, and course materials.

**Supported File Types:**
- Documents: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, RTF
- Images: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, SVG, WEBP
- Videos: MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV
- Archives: ZIP, RAR, 7Z
- Presentations: PPT, PPTX
- Spreadsheets: XLS, XLSX
- Audio: MP3, WAV, AAC

**Security Features:**
- File type validation
- Size limits enforcement
- Virus scanning
- Access control by roles
- Secure storage with encryption

**Upload Categories:**
- course_material: Course-related files
- project_file: Project assets and deliverables
- profile_image: User profile pictures
- document: General documents
- assignment: Student assignments
- resource: Learning resources
- certificate: Certificates and achievements

item.description: Endpoints for uploading and managing files with authentication and access control.

item.description:
**COMPREHENSIVE USER ONBOARDING** - Complete user onboarding flow for new users including language selection, goal selection, and skills selection.

**Onboarding Flow:**
1. Language Selection - Users select preferred languages
2. Goal Selection - Users choose their learning goal (returns related skills)
3. Skills Selection - Users select specific skills and complete onboarding

**Key Features:**
- Multi-language preference selection
- Goal-based skill recommendation
- Skill validation against selected goal
- Automatic onboarding completion marking
- Progress tracking through onboarding steps

**Base URL:** `/api/onboarding`

**Authentication:** Required - User must be logged in

**Process:** Sequential - Each step builds on the previous
item.name: User Onboarding API - COMPREHENSIVE
Onboarding Flow

request.description: First step of onboarding: User selects their preferred languages. Creates associations between user and selected languages. Validates that all language IDs exist before proceeding.
Second step of onboarding: User selects their learning goal. Updates user's goal and returns all skills related to the selected goal for the next step.
Final step of onboarding: User selects specific skills and completes onboarding. Validates that selected skills belong to the chosen goal, creates skill associations, and marks user as onboarded.

item.description: Complete user onboarding flow - must be completed in sequence

item.name: Onboarding Support Data

request.description: Get all available languages for user selection. Used to populate language selection UI in step 1.
Get all available learning goals for user selection. Used to populate goal selection UI in step 2.
Get all skills related to a specific goal. This endpoint is automatically called after goal selection, but can be used separately for UI population.

item.description: Supporting endpoints for onboarding data retrieval

item.name: Onboarding Status

request.description: Get user profile to check onboarding status. The 'isOnboarded' field indicates if the user has completed the onboarding process.

item.description: Check user onboarding completion status

**COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH API** - Advanced search functionality covering courses, projects, instructors with analytics and filtering capabilities.

**Key Features:**
- Intelligent autocomplete suggestions with ranking
- Advanced course search with comprehensive filtering
- Instructor search with skill-based filtering
- Project search with technology filtering
- Comprehensive multi-type search
- Search analytics and reporting (Admin)
- Recent searches and personalization
- Filter options management

**Base URL:** `/api/search`

**Authentication:** Optional for basic search, required for analytics

**Search Types:**
- Suggestions: Quick autocomplete with recent searches
- Courses: Advanced filtering by category, level, price, etc.
- Instructors: Filter by subjects, skill level, rating
- Projects: Filter by difficulty, technology, duration
- Comprehensive: Multi-type search with unified results

{
  "courseId": 123,

  "isPublished": true,
